resources.string: This is all about the city.Qingdao is located in Shandong Penisula southern end , mountain and the sea .Here you can see beautiful pleasant climate .This city is a unique sea side city . It is one of the important city of eastern china.Here you can see soft sand beach at coastal level.

In this city the best season is summer.In this time sea water is hot ,warm due to high temperature .Beer festival fall in this time . It is perfect time for delicious sea food and enjoy a good season.

Here beer festival is famous.Beer festival is found in 1991.Every year in August celebrates this festival .The general term of 16 days beer festival is determined by the relevant national ministers and city municipal peoples . Quindao logo is the land mark sculpture architectures .It’s located in the beautiful may fourth square up to 30m diameter 27m , the most prominent features in that is the most pure shape elements arranged in combine into rotation of rising of “wind” the shape to make fully reflection.

Linyi is a prefecture-level city in the south of Shandong province, People\'s Republic of China. As of 2011, Linyi is the largest prefecture-level city in Shandong, both by area and population, Linyi borders Rizhao to the east.

Quindao International Airport is one airport in this city . In addition to domestic 30 cities outside and opened up to japan ,korea, singapore many international lines are there. This city has three railway stations.From these three stations every day people travel all over other cities . Every 10 minutes gap bus available at nearest bus stop.All buses are very much comfortable to travel. Commonly used bus stop is quindao north bus station,east bus station etc.
